attributes.action: introduce a new National ID Card that will merge with the current "National Insurance Card" and "NHS card"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cut reduce bureaucracy and increase convenience by introducing a new non-compulsory ID card that will merge with the present NHS and National Insurance Cards. This card will serve as ID, State Medical Care and Taxation, allowing cooperation across these fields, personal convenience and less paper work.
